parsianCargo.title: Payam Cargo Parsian
parsianCargo.description: Payam Cargo Parsian is a cargo company that provides services to send and receive cargo from Iran to the world and vice versa.
parsianCargo.aboutUsDescription: Learn more about Payam Cargo Parsian
parsianCargo.ourServicesDescription: Learn more about the services we provide

services.freightCostDescription: Calculate the cost of sending your cargo

aboutUs.satisfactionDescription: We are committed to providing the best service to our customers
aboutUs.cooperateWithUsDescription: We are always looking for new partners to expand our services
aboutUs.licensesDescription: We have all the necessary licenses to provide cargo services

hero.slide1Description: Description: Quick and reliable shipping with standard packaging and full safety measures to prevent damage
hero.slide2Description: Description: Global shipping with trusted logistics partners and specialized solutions for different types of cargo
hero.slide3Description: Description: Handling all customs clearance procedures and documentation to expedite international shipments
hero.slide4Description: Description: Priority shipping options for urgent deliveries with guaranteed timeframes

introduction.descriptionText: With over two decades of excellence in international logistics, we ve established ourselves as a leading force in global transportation. Our comprehensive suite of services spans air, sea, and land logistics, delivering unparalleled reliability and efficiency to our worldwide client base.

features.card1Description: Fast and reliable shipping services across the world with real-time tracking capabilities.
features.card2Description: Specialized handling for all types of cargo including sensitive and high-value items.
features.card3Description: Round-the-clock customer service to assist you with all your shipping needs.
